module.displayName: Advanced Pack - Create product packs and bundles
module.description: Create advanced packs and bundles with Advanced Pack module
module.author: Presta-Module
module.description_full: Create advanced packs and bundles with Advanced Pack module. Create different sales offers, display packs in cross selling areas, select product combinations available for pack sales, simplify stock and VAT management…
module.additional_description: A PRECIOUS TOOL FOR ADDITIONAL SALES Advanced Pack enables you to increase your average cart value by offering your customers the opportunity to purchase a coherent set of products, called a pack, at an attractive price. By grouping together products whose simultaneous sale makes sense (such as a camera, its tripod and the appropriate memory card), you guide your customers through their buying process, just as you would in a physical store, while saving them time. Indeed, by showcasing complementary products on the same page, you save them the hassle of searching for each product individually, with the risk of, for instance, not selecting compatible products. With the pack, they can add multiple items to their cart with a single click, ensuring they purchase the correct references. Thanks to your packs, you also enable your customers to save money by offering these product sets at a discounted price. For instance, Advanced Pack allows you to provide one of the products in the pack for free or to offer customized discounts based on the item combinations selected. Finally, creating a pack allows you to improve the visibility of certain products by associating them with your best-sellers. A FAST AND INTUITIVE PACK CREATION Inherit product information Select the products to be included in the pack, save: the pack can already be sold on your site with a set of default parameters. Nothing could be faster! All the properties of the products making up the pack are automatically retrieved (descriptions, prices, images, features, etc.) to save you time: no need to rewrite descriptions, reinsert images, etc... Advanced Pack automatically displays the images and descriptions of the products in the pack in tabs on the product page. You can then customize this display if you want! Your customers can therefore be properly informed about all the products in the pack while remaining on the same page, and finalize their purchase with a single click. Fine management of combinations Unlike PrestaShop's native "pack" functionality, you don't need to create a pack for each product combination: the module's creation tool allows you, for each product to be included in the pack, to choose the combination(s) you want to make available specifically for this mode of sale. For example, you can make only certain colors of a product available if it is purchased within a pack. You can also define a default combination for each product, even if it is different from the one defined in your catalog, in order to sell off certain stocks more easily. Once your pack is built, your customers are free to select, for each item in the pack, the attribute (color, size, dimension, ...) they want from those you have chosen to make available. They benefit from the same preferential discount defined for the pack, regardless of the chosen combination, even if the combinations have different prices (price impacts on combinations are taken into account). Pack Customization In addition to choosing the combinations to be included in the pack, you can let your customers change the quantity of each of the products included in the pack, or set them yourself. Advanced Pack also gives you the option of letting your customers remove a product from the pack, if they want. Would you like a product to be sold only through a pack? That's also possible! You can even make it a free gift. For example, you can offer an extended warranty for the purchase of a dishwasher. This extension will then be exclusively conditioned to the purchase of the dishwasher. With Advanced Pack, the customization possibilities are endless! (*)See conditions in "Features" section ENCOURAGE YOUR CUSTOMERS TO ORDER IN PACKS WITH A SPECIAL OFFER To encourage your customers to order a product as part of a pack rather than on its own, offer them a benefit they can't refuse! Advanced Pack allows you to create three types of sales offers. 3 types of sales offers are possible thanks to Advanced Pack: Offer a specific discount on each product in the packApply a general discount on all productsApply a fixed price to the pack, like a psychological price, for example In addition to these possibilities, Advanced Pack allows you to take into account, or not, the discounts that may already exist on your products. You thus have the choice between: reflecting existing discounts on the sale price of the packor, on the contrary, exclude them to favor the discount defined for the pack The module also includes a dynamic pack price simulator to help you create your sales operation. On the customer side, and unlike the native "pack" functionality, the sales offer related to the pack purchase is clearly highlighted on the product page. The visitor immediately understands that he can save money by favoring this method. QUICK AND EASY ORDER AND INVENTORY MANAGEMENT Ordering a pack is managed in such a way that you retain the advantages of ordering separate products. First of all, the pack stock is calculated from the stocks of its products. There's no need to define stock at pack level. Each time a pack is ordered, individual product stocks are automatically deducted. Then, on the invoice and order details in the back-office, each product appears on a different line, as if it had been ordered separately. This has major advantages: No surprises when it comes to stocks: for each product, you have just one stock to manage, whether the product is sold on its own or as part of a pack. You avoid the complexities of managing two different stocks for the same product.Refunds and returns are managed at the individual product level: for example, you can refund only one product in a pack, or put a returned product back on sale.Easy management of products with different VAT rates: the invoice displays the tax amount for each different VAT rate.Ability to export pack orders to an ERP-type management and analysis system, without having to make any technical modifications to enable it to take pack orders into account. Moreover, if one of the products (or a product combination) in a pack is out of stock, the pack will automatically be indicated as unavailable for purchase using an availability alert system. No risk of you receiving orders for unavailable products! An option also allows you to force the display of another combination if the default combination is out of stock. INCREASE PACK VISIBILITY WITH CROSS-SELLING For even greater visibility, you can display a block "This product is also available in pack" on the pages of products that are also part of a pack. In this way, thanks to a dedicated commercial offer, you can encourage your customers to order the pack rather than the product alone. In short, this is cross-selling: an accessible and effective way of increasing your average cart! POSSIBILITY TO SELL A SAME PRODUCT IN BUNDLES (minimum compatibility PrestaShop 1.7.7.0) Do you have products that can be packaged in bundles of several units? Offer your customers the chance to save money by ordering a product in a bundle rather than individually, thanks to a dedicated offer. They'll be able to order the bundle directly from the page of the concerned product.

module.additional_description: Best module for Facebook and Instagram, elected "Agencies' choice" and winner of two PrestaShop awards, Facebook Dynamic Ads + Pixel already has more than 10,000 downloads! Our team of experts in social networks for over 10 years, accompanies you with a complete documentation and a great responsiveness to support. EXPORT A HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT FEED ON FACEBOOK The "Dynamic Ads + Pixel" module allows you to configure your data feed in an extremely simple and fast way by including only the products and information you want. The advanced exclusion rules system gives you the freedom to create an optimized feed by excluding certain products from your ads. The advanced assignment of custom labels to your products further increases the customization of your data feed and allows you to increase the segmentation possibilities of your catalog. Product feeds generated and imported in the Facebook Business Manager will allow you: to automatically populate and keep updated the Shop of your Facebook Page and Instagram business profileto run product ads on Facebook and Instagram to highly targeted audiencesto show Facebook and Instagram users location-specific data (information translated into their language, prices, availability, shipping costs etc... tailored to their location) through country feedsto tag your products in your Facebook and Instagram publications or stories TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE WORLD'S MOST ADVANCED ADVERTISING TECHNOLOGY Thanks to countless personal information collected on its network, each more accurate than the others, Facebook has a powerful advertising targeting tool on which Google can not compete. On the Business Manager interface you have a multitude of options allowing you to create your advertising audiences according to age, sex, family situation, geographical location, interests, groups, liked pages and any other information that Facebook has about its users. By installing a tracking tag (Facebook pixel) on your site pages, our module allows you to further enhance these audiences. Indeed, this pixel allows you to create audiences based on your visitor activity (purchases, products seen, carts,...). It also allows you to enjoy the indisputable efficiency of dynamic retargeting. Thus, you can for example to launch ad campaigns that will automatically display to Facebook users, the products they previously viewed on your site, or relevant product recommandations. Business Manager tools will then allow you to analyse the efficiency of these ads (conversion tracking). For an even more accurate analysis of the effectiveness of your ads and an even better tracking of the buying journey, activate the conversions API in addition to the Pixel to send the data directly from your store's server! The power of Facebook also allows you to acquire new customers by attracting people whose interests are close to your current customers. Indeed, the personal information of the social network users, own by Facebook, is compared to the one of your existing customers. You can therefore display your products to these audiences, which are similar to your clientele. OFFER A LOCALIZED VERSION OF YOUR ADS AND YOUR FACEBOOK SHOP Our module allows you to use Facebook's country feeds to offer multi-country and multi-lingual Facebook and Instagram users a Shop and ads adapted to their location. For example, a Facebook user in the US will see your product data in English and prices in dollars in your Facebook Store, while a French user will see the same information in French and Euros. But it doesn't stop at language and currency! All data that has different values in other countries will automatically adapt to the locality (availability, sizes, shipping costs, etc...). By default, the module proposes all possible "Country/Language/Currency" combinations according to the native localization packs installed on your PrestaShop store. However, you have the possibility to create additional feeds corresponding to combinations not proposed by the module.

Whether it's their price, quantity in stock, or category, complete these operations in bulk in a few clicks or schedule them.   Using relevant filters and a search box, quickly select the products to edit and apply a -20% discount on their price, an increase of + €15, add 100 items to the stock or add a new category in bulk to this selection for example. module.description: The Cart Dropdown module allows you to configure a cart dropdown in order to optimize the user experience for your customers and prompt them to finalize their order
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The Cart Dropdown module allows you to configure a cart dropdown in order to optimize the user experience for your customers and prompt them to finalize their order.   This cart summary appears when the mouse is hovered over it and can redirect your customers directly to the first step of the purchase funnel for a better conversion rate.
module.additional_description: Boost your conversion rate: According to Sale Cycle, 74% of your site’s visitors will abandon their cart without pressing the order button. Make it easier for them to access this button by showing the Order button in your dropdown menu so that they can complete their order more quickly.  23% of shoppers abandon a cart simply because they do not have a clear idea of the total amount of an order while shopping. With our Cart Dropdown module, your customers can view their cart in advance when they want to know their price, on any page, they visit.  Offer a better customer experience:Being able to check their cart summary from any page without exiting their navigation gives customers peace of mind. This cart dropdown has been designed to respond to customer mouse movements in order to prevent frustration

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: With the reCaptcha - Google Anti Spam module, you can prevent robot spams and secure your store with human behavior recognition technology. Please note that the ReCaptcha module is not compatible with the "one page checkout" option on PrestaShop 1.6. However, your ReCaptcha will be visible on the "one page checkout" on PrestaShop 1.7.
module.additional_description: ReCaptcha is a system that builds on the capabilities of human user recognition using CAPTCHA tests (Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computer and Humans Apart)Block robots and spam from accessing your store when creating accounts, logging into accounts and sending contact messages.

module.name: opartstat
module.displayName: Op’art stat: reliable and useful ecommerce statistics
module.description: Access exceptional depth of analysis with advanced filters, personalization and tailored metrics
module.author: Op-art
module.description_full: Access exceptional depth of analysis with advanced filters, personalization and tailored metrics.
module.additional_description: Op’art Stat goes further than the simple display of classic data. Thanks to advanced filters, customization and tailor-made metrics, the module offers you exceptional depth of analysis that allows you to take concrete action to grow your ecommerce. With the Op’art Stat module, you will never again be limited in the analysis and understanding of your data. NEW: connect Op'art Stat and Op'art Devis together to get ten new metrics related to your quotes. More than 80 metrics available for a 360-degree view of your data.With more than 80 metrics available, the Op'art Stat module allows you to consult at a glance all the key indicators (KPIs) essential for your ecommerce. You will know where you stand at all times and will be able to easily follow the progress of your business. Exceptional depth of analysis thanks to advanced filtersThe Op'art Stat module not only provides numerous metrics, it also offers advanced filtering options that will allow you to achieve an extremely advanced level of analysis. Indeed, all the metrics offered by Op’art stat can be filtered by: product, category, brand, customer group, country and payment method. These filters can be used as inclusion or exclusion filters, and can be combined for in-depth analysis. Using these filters, you can get incredibly accurate data. For example, you can analyze sales of a specific product in a particular country, or understand the purchasing behavior of a group of customers using a certain payment method. You can also exclude certain categories or brands to focus on the data that is most relevant to you and eliminate “parasite data” that alter your statistics. Such precision in your data allows you to understand exactly what is happening in your business, spot trends and specific issues, and make decisions based on accurate information. Track specific data with tailored metrics.We know that each e-commerce has its own specificities. This is why the Op’art Stat module offers the possibility of creating personalized metrics, for an analysis that perfectly matches your needs. This advanced functionality allows you to extract and integrate any relevant data directly into the module. You can even integrate data from an external service directly into the module. Warning: Adding custom metrics requires some coding skills. If you work with an agency, they will be able to add these metrics for you very simply and we can do this for you as well. Complete report customization for views tailored to your needs.The Op'art Stat module emphasizes customization, allowing you to choose precisely which metrics to display on each report and their order of appearance. With the variety of reports available and filtering options, you have the freedom to create views that meet your exact needs. Whether you want a report focused on traffic, finances, or any other aspect of your e-commerce, Op'art Stat gives you the possibility to do so and you can of course create a report with the key figures you wish to consult daily. You can create, duplicate, and delete reports with a single click. Thus, if you want to easily follow the sales evolution of a given category, brand or product, you just need to create a report with the corresponding filters to access its data in one click. Ideal for teamwork.Op'art Stat facilitates teamwork by allowing each member to benefit from all the customization features. Each team member can create their own reports, tailored to their needs. The sales manager can create reports focused on sales by product and region, while the marketing manager can focus on metrics related to advertising campaigns. Likewise, the financial director may have reports dedicated to the financial aspects of the company, etc. Thus, each member of the team has a clear and precise view of the information that is relevant to them, thus facilitating decision-making and collaboration. An autonomous module independent of any external solution.Op'art Stat is a standalone module that does not need any other module to works. It also does not use Google Analytics or any other external services. You can therefore, if you wish, get rid of these additional modules and only use Op'art Stat for all your analyses. You simplify the management of your e-commerce by reducing the number of modules that you must use and update regularly. With Op'art Stat, you have a unique and powerful tool that meets all your analysis needs, allowing you to focus on what really matters: the growth of your business. Fast display and maintenance of your site's performance.Op’art stat is designed to offer optimal performance. With optimized queries and asynchronous loading, it quickly displays all your metrics. (The module has been tested on stores with more than 100,000 products and 50,000 orders without encountering any problems.) Unlike certain statistics modules which can slow down your store by recording too much information in the database, Op'art Stat has been designed to preserve the performance of your PrestaShop. In fact, 90% of the data used by the module is already present in your Prestashop and will never be modified. For the remaining 10% of data, it is monitored and automatically limited by our module. (This limit can be modified by the merchant in the module configuration). Immediate access to your data historyYou have access to all your data history as soon as the module is installed. Only traffic data starts accumulating from the day of installation. Live dataOp'art Stat offers a "Live" table which provides real-time data on your store. It is a valuable tool for tracking the instant activity of your e-commerce and the behavior of your users. Monitoring marketing campaignsThanks to URL markers (utm), effectively monitor your marketing campaigns and obtain detailed data on their performance and their impact on your e-commerce. Comparative temporal and filter analysisOf course, Op'art Stat offers the possibility of comparing different periods. But you can also compare different filters.For example, you can compare the sales of two products or two categories over the same period. Compatible multi-boutique.The module is multi-store compatible, so you can consult the figures for each of your stores or look at the cumulative statistics of all your stores. Export your data in one click.You can get standard CSV exports in one click and integrate your data into any spreadsheet or software. Premium after-sales service and more than 10 years of experienceSelling modules is not a secondary activity for us, it is our only activity! Therefore, we put 100% of our energy into providing you with quality modules and after-sales service that meets your expectations. Our 10 years of experience in creating and maintaining PrestaShop modules allow us, if necessary, to intervene quickly and without risk on your store.
